title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy model inference and chat.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard for chatting with local Ollama models; supports multi-model, file uploads, themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for AI pair-programming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: llamafile → ollama bridge
summary: Mozilla’s llamafile can expose Ollama-compatible endpoints so existing tools still work.

title: haystack-ollama
summary: DeepSet Haystack integration for retrieval pipelines using Ollama generators and embedders.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (rich + prompt-toolkit) for multi-session chat history with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready compose stack adding Nginx, WebUI, and automatic GPU runtime detection.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit starter project that wires Ollama models into conversational data apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK with strongly-typed requests/responses and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your knowledge base notes.

title: r/ollama – weekly models thread
summary: Reddit community sharing custom Modelfiles, quantization tips, and performance benchmarks.

title: Hacker News: Show HN – Ollama 0.1.38 with tool use support
summary: Discussion around the new /api/chat tools field enabling function-calling with local models.

title: Ollama on npm – download stats
summary: Official ollama package trending with 60k weekly downloads and zero native dependencies.

title: Ollama on PyPI – project metadata
summary: Shows 0.3.0 release with wheel support for macOS, Linux, Windows and automatic protobuf pinning.
